name: The Dark Room (Ari ✨)
description:
The Dark Room The Dark Room is a small, interactive escape room where you can choose the main element to guide you through your journey.

Will you be able to find the 4 different endings?

Before playing, make sure your volume is on 100%. The game is played with your mouse or touchpad, in fullscreen.

NOTE: When the game's over, the story will restart automatically. You don't need to reload the browser nor press any button.

Some of the sounds in the game belong to pingudroid's 8-bit sound effects pack, which you can find here.

Game originally developed as part of Ludipe's Gift Jam.

If you need me, you can find me on Twitter. Any feedback or suggestions are highly appreciated!
